description: D√©sactive uniquement les services de t√©l√©m√©trie et de collecte de donn√©es Windows (approche conservatrice).

windowsCommandTemplate.name: Disable-TelemetryServices
windowsCommandTemplate.commandPattern: $telemetryServices = @('DiagTrack','dmwappushservice','diagnosticshub.standardcollector.service','DPS','WerSvc','wercplsupport'); $count = 0; foreach ($svc in $telemetryServices) { try { $service = Get-Service -Name $svc -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($service) { Stop-Service -Name $svc -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Set-Service -Name $svc -StartupType Disabled -ErrorAction Stop; $count++ } } catch { Write-Warning "Service $svc non trouv√© ou d√©j√† d√©sactiv√©" } }; Write-Host "$count services de t√©l√©m√©trie d√©sactiv√©s" -ForegroundColor Green

examples.description: D√©sactive le service de t√©l√©m√©trie principal

notes: Approche s√ªre: d√©sactive uniquement DiagTrack, dmwappushservice, WerSvc (rapports d'erreurs), DPS (diagnostics). Am√©liore confidentialit√© et performances sans affecter les fonctionnalit√©s. Recommand√© pour la plupart des utilisateurs.
